events.name: 15th Psychology Days: Colorful Psychology
events.eventHost: Istanbul Okan University Department of Psychology
events.description:
Everything speaks in its own language;

Even if darkness covers it

It continues in the night, in various colors

On the tree branch, in the wind;

Everything speaks in its own color.

Can YÃ¼cel, Green Poem

We are organizing this event for undergraduate psychology students and newly graduated psychology enthusiasts. Our aim is to bring together young individuals at the beginning of their journey with those who have dedicated years to various disciplines of psychology. Thus, we want to connect young psychologists or candidates who are seeking their own path with different role models and create an active interaction environment where emotions, thoughts, and experiences are shared...

Where did the idea of 'Colorful Psychology' come from? Let's explain by quoting from the text I wrote while introducing the Psychology Department on Okan University's Psychology Department website: Imagine for a moment that you want to paint a wall in your house. Needless to say, before obtaining your color, you need to make some preparations to color the wall. First, you must repair and prime the wall. Then, with the right information, you mentally prepare the color, quality, and suitability of the actual coloring you will apply in multiple layers. Undergraduate education in psychology is like this initial stage to achieve the desired outcome and establish a solid foundation. Your color choice occurs as a final step that reflects your desire and goal. Let's continue with our coloring analogy. There are so many colors to choose from that each one can open the doors to a different world for you...

We couldn't cover all the colors in this first meeting. There are many more colors to come. Let's get started. We are waiting for all students. See you soon..

Prof. Dr. Arif Haldun SOYGÃœR

â“Who Can Attend the Training?

ğŸ¯Objective of the Training
-To provide general information about neuropsychology, neuropsychological assessment, neuropsychological tests; to transfer what these tests measure, their validity, and to impart skills in administering, scoring, and interpreting these tests.

ğŸ–‡ï¸ Tests are not included in the training fee.

events.name: 35 Basic Techniques Used in Psychotherapy
events.description:
Within the scope of the program, regardless of the school they practice, participants will be provided with 35 fundamental techniques from various approaches, essential for their toolkit. These techniques are designed to facilitate swift change in clients, especially when encountering challenges during psychotherapy sessions.

The objective of the program is to impart practical skills in applying a wide array of fundamental techniques functional in therapy and derived from many different schools. Throughout the program, participants will be introduced to the theoretical underpinnings of effective and functional techniques from evidence-based therapeutic schools.

Following this theoretical presentation, participants will be given detailed instructions on how to apply these techniques through case studies, and will have the opportunity to practice these techniques through role-plays. This approach ensures that participants complete the program with both a theoretical understanding and practical experience in applying these key techniques.
